about_the_game:
Dispel is an adventure set in a dark fantasy world.

You are broke and decide to set off on a journey in search of wealth and fame. After dozens of cold nights in the forest, your eye catches an inconspicuous cave. Without hesitation, you rush straight into the very depth of it...

Key Features

  • Procedural generation of levels. With procedurally generated levels, no two runs are ever the same, allowing for countless hours of gameplay.
  • Decide on how you want to play. Choose a unique class, race, and then continue to customize your character's appearance.
  • Play by exploring and combining any skill tree of your choice.
  • Challenge a unique setup of random curses that weaken your character. Find magic books containing powerful enchantments that help dispel the darkness.
  • Explore unique areas, each holds a variety of dangers, such as creepy monsters, exclusive bosses, and unrivaled traps.
  • Collect a full set of armor or combine different types. Create the strongest character ever.
  • Find all the secret levels to explore extensive locations with cities never seen before.
  • Non-target action combat

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

Dispel is an adventure set in a dark fantasy world.

You are broke and decide to set off on a journey in search of wealth and fame. After dozens of cold nights in the forest, your eye catches an inconspicuous cave. Without hesitation, you rush straight into the very depth of it...

Key Features

  • Procedural generation of levels. With procedurally generated levels, no two runs are ever the same, allowing for countless hours of gameplay.
  • Decide on how you want to play. Choose a unique class, race, and then continue to customize your character's appearance.
  • Play by exploring and combining any skill tree of your choice.
  • Challenge a unique setup of random curses that weaken your character. Find magic books containing powerful enchantments that help dispel the darkness.

name: Dispel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Version)
  • Processor: Intel i5-750/AMD Phenom II X4-945
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Version)
  • Processor: Intel i7-11700/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 Ti / AMD RX 6650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card

short_description: Dispel is the third-person, action RPG that features permanent death and procedurally generated levels. Adventure solo in this challenging roguelike-inspired game.
